posts.post_title: FS: T205 Edward Barger - Both Variations $35 for the pair **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following pair of T205 cards available for sale.  Both Edward Barger variations (full "B" on cap and the short print partial "B" on cap) are included.  

Please add $1 shipping for individual cards.  Buy the pair, and I will cover shipping.  I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

Prices are:

Barger (full B, Polar Bear) - $15
Barger (partial B) - $23

Both cards for $35 delivered.
Bump for a price drop on this pair of cards.  Thanks for looking!
